name: Purple Slime
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone
senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 8

actions.desc: The purple slime makes two spike attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage and 10 (3d6) poison damage. In addition, the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or its Strength score is reduced by 1d4. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.
actions.name: Spike

special_abilities.desc: The purple slime can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
special_abilities.name: Amorphous

special_abilities.desc: The purple slime can breathe air and water.
special_abilities.name: Amphibious

special_abilities.desc: The purple slime has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.
special_abilities.name: Underwater Camouflage
